trait.name: Nimble Escape
trait.text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
trait.text: Krenko can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Krenko makes two attacks with his scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage..

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
reaction.text: When a creature Krenko can see targets him with an attack, Krenko chooses another goblin within 5 feet of him. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
trait.text: The rig is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rig must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Unstable
trait.text: If the rig takes damage, it must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated with a speed of 0 until a creature activates it with a successful 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check made as an action.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The armor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Kraul Warrior
monster.languages: Kraul,understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Hive Mind
trait.text: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Explosive Tank
trait.text: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

action.name: Light Hammer
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Scorchbringer (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Formation Tactics
trait.text: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.
